Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.apache.hbase</groupId>
  <artifactId>hbase</artifactId>
  <version>0.98.1-hadoop2</version>
  <type>pom</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'org.apache.hbase:hbase:pom:0.98.1-hadoop2'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="org.apache.hbase" name="hbase" rev="0.98.1-hadoop2">
  <artifact name="hbase" type="pom" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='org.apache.hbase', module='hbase', version='0.98.1-hadoop2')
)

Grails

compile 'org.apache.hbase:hbase:0.98.1-hadoop2'

Leiningen

[org.apache.hbase/hbase "0.98.1-hadoop2"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "org.apache.hbase" %% "hbase" % "0.98.1-hadoop2"
